[00:00.00]Price Tag - Jessie J/B.o.B
[00:01.21]Lyrics by：Jessie J
[00:01.90]Composed by：Jessie J
[00:02.59]Jessie J：
[00:02.94]Okay Coconut Man Moonhead and Pea
[00:08.57]
[00:09.91]You ready
[00:10.46]
[00:12.44]Seems like everybody's got a price
[00:14.72]
[00:15.37]I wonder how they sleep at night
[00:17.85]When the sale comes first and the truth comes second
[00:20.71]Just stop for a minute and smile
[00:23.79]Why is everybody so serious
[00:26.48]Acting so d**n mysterious
[00:28.96]Got shades on your eyes
[00:30.29]And your heels so high that you can't even have a good time
[00:34.69]Everybody look to their left
[00:36.79]
[00:37.47]Everybody look to their right
[00:39.37]
[00:39.89]Can you feel that
[00:40.88]Yeah
[00:41.51]We're paying with love tonight
[00:43.55]It's not about the money money money
[00:46.36]We don't need your money money money
[00:48.96]We just wanna make the world dance
[00:51.32]
[00:51.82]Forget about the price tag
[00:54.08]
[00:54.67]Ain't about the uh cha-ching cha-ching
[00:57.60]Ain't about the yeah ba-bling ba-bling
[01:00.11]Wanna make the world dance
[01:02.79]Forget about the price tag
[01:05.16]
[01:05.88]Okay
[01:06.38]
[01:07.53]We need to take it back in time
[01:09.68]
[01:10.22]When music made us all unite
[01:12.80]And it wasn't low blows and video h*es
[01:15.83]Am I the only one getting tired
[01:18.63]Why is everybody so obsessed
[01:21.37]Money can't buy us happiness
[01:23.77]Can we all slow down and enjoy right now
[01:26.45]Guarantee we'll be feeling alright
[01:29.57]Everybody look to their left
[01:31.29]To their left
[01:32.34]Everybody look to their right
[01:34.07]To their right
[01:34.93]Can you feel that
[01:35.79]Yeah
[01:36.45]We're paying with love tonight
[01:38.49]It's not about the money money money
[01:41.21]We don't need your money money money
[01:43.82]We just wanna make the world dance
[01:46.69]Forget about the price tag
[01:48.86]
[01:49.48]Ain't about the uh cha-ching cha-ching
[01:52.37]Ain't about the yeah ba-bling ba-bling
[01:55.00]Wanna make the world dance
[01:57.15]
[01:57.65]Forget about the price tag
[01:59.59]B.o.B：
[02:00.08]Yeah yeah well keep the price tag and take the cash back
[02:03.36]Just give me six strings
[02:04.64]Six strings
[02:05.00]And a half-stack
[02:05.96]Half stack
[02:06.42]And you can can keep the cars leave me the garage
[02:08.81]And all I yes all I need are keys and guitars
[02:11.51]And guess what
[02:12.32]In thirty seconds I'm leaving to Mars
[02:14.35]Yeah we leaping across these undefeatable odds
[02:17.07]It's like this man you can't put a price on a life
[02:20.16]We do this for the love so we fight and sacrifice every night
[02:23.50]So we ain't gon' stumble and fall never
[02:25.80]Waiting to see this in the sign of defeat uh-uh
[02:28.43]So we gon' keep everyone moving their feet
[02:30.98]So bring back the beat and then everyone sing
[02:33.16]Jessie J/B.o.B：
[02:33.84]It's not about the money money money
[02:36.03]We don't need your money money money
[02:38.39]We just wanna make the world dance
[02:41.44]Forget about the price tag
[02:44.27]Ain't about the uh cha-ching cha-ching
[02:47.07]Ain't about the yeah ba-bling ba-bling
[02:49.76]Wanna make the world dance
[02:52.47]Forget about the price tag
[02:53.75]Hey hey
[02:55.33]It's not about the money money money
[02:57.74]We don't need it
[02:58.40]We don't need your money money money
[02:59.97]No I don't we don't need it
[03:01.09]We just wanna make the world dance
[03:02.98]Dance dance your a*s off
[03:03.72]Forget about the price tag
[03:05.95]Ah ah
[03:06.47]Ain't about the yea-yeah cha-ching cha-ching
[03:09.00]Ain't about the woo ba-bling ba-bling
[03:11.55]It ain't about
[03:12.05]Wanna make the world dance
[03:13.64]Yeah yeah
[03:14.41]Forget about the price tag
[03:16.66]
[03:17.42]Jessie J：
[03:17.86]
[03:18.46]Ahh ahh ahh ahh
[03:27.21]
[03:28.82]Yeah yeah ahh ooh-ooh ahh
[03:33.75]Forget about the price tag heh

[ar:Jessie J/B.o.B]
[al:Price Tag]

[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.21]//
[00:01.90]//
[00:02.59]//
[00:02.94]//
[00:08.57]
[00:09.91]准备好了么
[00:10.46]
[00:12.44]似乎人人都有个价码牌 
[00:14.72]
[00:15.37]我真好奇他们夜晚怎么睡得下来
[00:17.85]赚钱总是被摆在第一位 而真相却被放在其次
[00:20.71]停下来 缓一会吧 来个微笑
[00:23.79]为什么要人人自危
[00:26.48]一副神神秘秘的样子
[00:28.96]你眼里的阴霾该如何驱散
[00:30.29]你的鞋跟踩得又是那么高 你都不能享受当下
[00:34.69]大家向左看齐
[00:36.79]
[00:37.47]大家向右看齐
[00:39.37]
[00:39.89]你能否感觉到
[00:40.88]//
[00:41.51]今晚我们爱意满洒
[00:43.55]这与钱无关 与钱无关 与钱无关
[00:46.36]我们才不需要你的钱
[00:48.96]我们只想世界与我们共舞
[00:51.32]
[00:51.82]一起忘却所谓的价码牌
[00:54.08]
[00:54.67]不是和这玩意有关 和钱无关
[00:57.60]也不是这个 和钻石珠宝无关
[01:00.11]只想让世界跟着跳动起来
[01:02.79]一起忘却所谓的价码牌
[01:05.16]
[01:05.88]好的
[01:06.38]
[01:07.53]我们要把一切时光回转
[01:09.68]
[01:10.22]那时音乐会让我们团结起来
[01:12.80]那时还没有那么多卑鄙小人 也没有那么多露骨的画面
[01:15.83]难道我是唯一的倦怠者
[01:18.63]为什么大家都会鬼迷心窍
[01:21.37]金钱又买不到幸福快乐 
[01:23.77]我们能不能让一切暂缓 及时行乐
[01:26.45]我保证大家都会觉得超棒
[01:29.57]大家向左看齐
[01:31.29]向左看齐
[01:32.34]大家向右看齐
[01:34.07]向右看齐
[01:34.93]你能否感觉到
[01:35.79]//
[01:36.45]今晚我们爱意满洒
[01:38.49]这与钱无关 与钱无关 与钱无关
[01:41.21]我们才不需要你的钱
[01:43.82]我们只想世界与我们共舞
[01:46.69]一起忘却所谓的价码牌

[01:49.48]不是和这玩意有关 和钱无关
[01:52.37]也不是这个 和钻石珠宝无关

[01:57.15]
[01:57.65]一起忘却所谓的价码牌
[01:59.59]//
[02:00.08]好吧 继续你的价码人生 快把钱给我拿回去
[02:03.36]我只需要六轨音频
[02:04.64]六轨音频
[02:05.00]和一组音频放大器
[02:05.96]一组音频放大器
[02:06.42]你可以留着那些车子 把车库留给我就好
[02:08.81]没错 我只需要音符和吉他的陪伴
[02:11.51]猜猜看怎样 
[02:12.32]我会在30秒内出发飞向火星
[02:14.35]没错 我们将要创造神话
[02:17.07]就是这样 你无法给他的人生标上价码
[02:20.16]一切以爱的名义 为此我们每晚义无反顾地战斗与牺牲
[02:23.50]所以我们永不踌躇 绝不会跌倒
[02:25.80]等着瞧吧 挫败你们的那一刻
[02:28.43]所以我们要让各位永不止步
[02:30.98]再次重复这个节奏 大家一起唱
